Package ru.dest.library.lang

Interface ISendAble

All Known Subinterfaces:
IAdvancedMessage, IMessage, ITitle
public interface ISendAble
Represents an object which can be sent
Since:
1.0
Author:
DestKoder

    • send

      void send​(Object receiver)
      Send an object to a player / console
      Parameters:
      receiver - Receiver of SandAble
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if receiver isn't a player / console / can't receive a message

      Also broadcast a message as a broadcast() but with permission check
      Parameters:
